title: Bug 2529 - Navigator: Open/Close project not always available
description: When selecting both projects P1 and P2, the Open/Close project option is not always available in the Navigator (1GFKW5S).
OB: When selecting both projects P1 and P2, the Open/Close project option should be available in the Navigator.
EB: The Open/Close project option is not available in the Navigator when both projects P1 and P2 are selected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create two projects, P1 and P2.
2. Select P2 and close it.
3. Check if the Open/Close project option is available in the Navigator.
